Question: Dongguan Lanhai Composite Materials Technology CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Lanhai Composite Materials Technology

Product Highlight: CES 2024

- AeroZero TPS, applicable for metals and composites, protects battery housing and parts in Lilium Jet eVTOL aircraft
- V-tail, five-passenger aircraft prioritizes safety and sustainability
- Agreement with green hydrogen producer extended for 2024, supporting global capacity expansions including CFRP cylinder production
- Multifunctional four-axis winding system for testing and manufacturing pressure vessels
- EHang unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) complies with approved type design, safety, and quality requirements
- New alliance broadens National Composites’ capabilities in SMC and BMC, providing comprehensive solutions
- Innovative prepreg tooling is highly drapable, capable of forming complex carbon fiber tooling shapes
- Switching from prepreg to RTM led to significant time and cost savings for the manufacture of fiberglass struts and complex carbon fiber composite foils
Summary_cn:
东莞蓝海复合材料技术

产品亮点：CES 2024

- AeroZero TPS，适用于金属和复合材料，保护Lilium Jet垂直起降电动飞行器的电池外壳和零部件
- V尾翼，五座客机，安全和可持续性优先
- 与绿色氢生产商达成2024年的协议，支持全球产能扩张，包括CFRP气瓶生产
- 多功能四轴绕线系统用于测试和制造压力容器
- EHang无人机符合批准的型号设计、安全和质量要求
- 新联盟扩大了National Composites在SMC和BMC领域的能力，提供全面的解决方案
- 创新的预浸料模具性能优良，能够形成复杂的碳纤维模具形状
- 从预浸料转换为RTM为玻璃纤维支柱和复杂碳纤维复合薄板的制造带来了显著的时间和成本节约
